API Users

async api.users.admin_user_required(cached_user: CachedUser = Depends(admin_required), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db)) → User[source]
api.users.read_current_user(request: Request, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user))[source]

Retrieve the current authenticated user’s data.

Rate-limited to 5 requests per minute.

Parameters:

  • request – FastAPI Request object (used by limiter).

  • current_user – User object from auth dependency.

Returns:

Current user data.

async api.users.set_user_role(user_id: int, role: RoleEnum, _: User = Depends(admin_required), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]

Change the role of another user. Requires admin access.

Parameters:

  • user_id – ID of the user whose role is to be changed.

  • role – New role to assign (RoleEnum).

  • _ – Current admin user (dependency).

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

Returns:

Success message with the updated role.

async api.users.upload_user_avatar(file: UploadFile = File(PydanticUndefined), current_user: User = Depends(admin_user_required), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))[source]

Upload and set a new avatar image for the authenticated admin user.

Parameters:

  • file – Uploaded avatar image file.

  • current_user – Authenticated admin user (checked via admin_user_required).

  • db – Async SQLAlchemy session.

Returns:

Updated user with new avatar URL.
